name: MySocialNightlife
overview:
MySocialNightlife.com is a web-based technology platform that provides a 360-degree solution for the nightclub and bar industry. Digital entertainment professionals Artin Nazarian and Michael Merrill founded the company in 2009. Their combined experience of working with major motion picture studios and experiencing the best of Los Angeles, Las Vegas, and Miami nightlife was the driver behind MySocialNightlife.com. By combining location-based, social media technology features with a streamlined web-based venue management solution, the platform offers a â€œhubâ€ for consumers who seek premium nightlife experiences and businesses that offer promotions, events, and the best of the nightclub and bar scene.

The web-based, social media-integrated system will change the way organizations promote their offerings, super-serve their customers, and manage the overall nightlife experience.

To date, features of the MySocialNightlife.com consumer-facing platform allow users to: â€¢ Manage and engage other nightlife-enthusiasts in a niche, social networking
environment

â€¢ Plan their nightlife experience through access to an up-to-date database of venues, DJ appearances, promotions, and live events

â€¢ Share their experiences and location updates with those outside the MySocialNightlife.com platform through syncing capabilities with key social networks

Additionally, venue management features will include the ability for users to: â€¢ Automate guest list management

â€¢ Manage table reservations

â€¢ View and analyze reports on guest and table sales performance

â€¢ View and analyze reports on promoter and VIP host performance

â€¢ Improve customer service and follow up opportunities through message automation

â€¢ Track visitors to a specific venue

â€¢ Offer incentives for return customers

Future plans include an iPhone mobile application, which will include all web-based version features plus several location-based technology and social media features. The company anticipates a Summer 2011 release.
